name: The local experience
description: On this trip I will show that Amsterdam has more to offer than the famous canals and red light district. The tourist scene and local scene are very separated in Amsterdam. With this trip I will try show how the locals experience the city! I will customize the trip to your wishes. Areas I will recommend you to visit are local markets of Amsterdam Old-West or Amsterdam-East, the old industrial areas of Amsterdam-North, local fishing villages very close to Amsterdam like Durgerdam, the typical Amsterdam architecture in the neighborhood Spaardammerbuurt, city windmills and of course nice local places to grab a bit or have drink!
